Extension_Description.message: Live preview of CSS/LESS code with an in-page editor. Featuring autocomplete, LESS code to CSS conversion, beautify, minify, etc.

Extension_Name.message: Live editor for CSS and LESS - Magic CSS

Include_CanRunOnOtherPages.message: You can run it on other web pages and websites.
